data.title: EastEnders' Sonia Fowler and Reiss Colwell to receive update on baby plans
data.meta_description: Sonia Fowler and Reiss Colwell have embarked on their journey to welcome a child into the world in recent episodes of EastEnders.
data.text:
EastEnders spoilers follow.

EastEnders' Sonia Fowler and Reiss Colwell will receive an update on their baby plans, as they embark on their journey to welcome a child into the world.

The couple recently made the massive relationship decision after Sonia broached the subject of trying IVF together.

But recent scenes have seen a dark twist in the storyline as Reiss plans to use money that belongs to him and his wife Debbie, who is unconscious in hospital and requires round-the-clock care after a serious stroke, without Sonia's knowledge.

Related: EastEnders star Balvinder Sopal praises show's Christmas death story

In upcoming scenes, Sonia is nervous to receive the results of her and Reiss' tests at the IVF follow-up appointment.

She becomes snappy and worried ahead of it, with Martin inadvertently getting caught in the crossfire.

Sonia and Reiss receive information on their chances of IVF success as well as a breakdown of the associated costs.

Related: EastEnders confirms devastating story for Ravi as Nugget goes missing

Reiss visits Debbie at the hospital, and tells her that he plans to spend her money on having IVF treatment with Sonia â€“ but will he go through with his plan?

Sonia also has a daughter, Bex Fowler, whom she welcomed with Martin Fowler when she was just 15 years old.

Related: EastEnders' Jay Brown tempted by newbie Nadine's offer

Elsewhere on the Square, Alfie Moon is set to struggle in the wake of his prostate cancer diagnosis and operation, leading to him telling Phil Mitchell he needs to rest and recuperate in Spain.

However, this leaves his son, Tommy, devastated as he was hoping to have his father present at his first boxing match.

And Cindy Beale demands money from George Knight, who knew her as Rose Knight, as she discovers that he has found a buyer for the family's bar in Marbella.

EastEnders airs on Mondays - Thursdays at 7.30pm on BBC One. The show also streams on BBC iPlayer.

Read more EastEnders spoilers on our dedicated homepage
